title: nAcE raghunAth
sahitya:
nAcE raghunAth rang dAsiIjan gAvE


caraNam 1    jhanak jhanak kanak kanak tOmta tAri tana tanAri dhrkiDha dhilank madhur dhun bajAvE
    caraNam 2    thirak thirak thaiya thaiya dItathim tatakatha thaiya 
dhrukuTadhIm dhrukuTadhIm tadhinna tAna sura milAvE
    caraNam 3    sur narEsh muni gaNEsh tErO hi pratAp gAvE padmanAbh caraNadAs kAmita phal pAvE
